post:
We are Fast & [affordable web hosting](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php) provider. Our data center is located in USA Los Angeles which gives fast access to USA and Asian traffic.

*  Softaculous: Automatic WordPress Installation
*  Solid State Drives (SSD)
*  DirectAdmin Panel
*  OpenLiteSpeed
*  Huge Storage Plans
*  99% Uptime Guarantee
*  Free Websites Migration
*  and much more...

Prices are mentioned below after applying 50% recurring coupon "extreme".
